channel.title: Gavin Casalegno on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Stars Sean Kaufman, Rain Spencer Talk “Staylor” Love Story and Filming ‘The Bear’-Like Kitchen Scene
item.description: Speaking alongside Gavin Casalegno, the co-stars also say they are in the dark about the movie plot: “We were lying to you a couple months ago, [but now] we actually don’t know anything!”

item.title: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Stars Sean Kaufman, Rain Spencer Talk “Staylor” Love Story and Filming ‘The Bear’-Like Kitchen Scene
item.description: Speaking alongside Gavin Casalegno, the co-stars also say they are in the dark about the movie plot: “We were lying to you a couple months ago, [but now] we actually don’t know anything!”

item.title: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Star Gavin Casalegno Reacts to Upcoming Movie and Those Fan Videos of Him Filming in Paris
item.description: The actor also reflects on the wedding that almost was between Jeremiah and Belly and why it could’ve still happened.

item.title: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Star Gavin Casalegno Reacts to Upcoming Movie and Those Fan Videos of Him Filming in Paris
item.description: The actor also reflects on the wedding that almost was between Jeremiah and Belly and why it could’ve still happened.

item.title: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Creator Jenny Han Always Intended for That Endgame, Shares Movie Details
item.description: The showrunner behind the hit Prime series says of the series finale leading into the upcoming movie: “I really wanted to give people a real meal, so I hope people feel happy.”

item.title: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty’ Creator Jenny Han Always Intended for That Endgame, Shares Movie Details
